verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came <WH1961> to me again saying, <WH559>
"Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> there were two <WH8147> women, <WH802> the daughters <WH1323> of one <WH259> mother; <WH517>

and they played <WH2181> the harlot <WH2181> in Egypt. <WH4714> They played <WH2181> the harlot <WH2181> in their youth; <WH5271> there <WH8033> their breasts <WH7699> were pressed, <WH4600> and there <WH8033> their virgin <WH1331> bosom <WH1717> was handled. <WH9439>

"And their names <WH8034> were Oholah <WH170> the elder <WH1419> and Oholibah <WH172> her sister. <WH269> And they became <WH1961> Mine, and they bore <WH3205> sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323> And [as for] their names, <WH8034> Samaria <WH8111> is Oholah, <WH170> and Jerusalem <WH3389> is Oholibah. <WH172>

"And Oholah <WH170> played <WH2181> the harlot <WH2181> while <WH8478> she was Mine; <WH8478> and she lusted <WH5689> after <WH5921> her lovers, <WH157> after <WH413> the Assyrians, <WH804> [her] neighbors, <WH7138>

who were clothed <WH3847> in purple, <WH8504> governors <WH6346> and officials, <WH5461> all <WH3605> of them desirable <WH2531> young <WH970> men, <WH970> horsemen <WH6571> riding <WH7392> on horses. <WH5483>

"And she bestowed <WH5414> her harlotries <WH8457> on them, all <WH3605> of whom [were] the choicest <WH4005> men <WH1121> of Assyria; <WH804> and with all <WH3605> whom <WH834> she lusted <WH5689> after, with all <WH3605> their idols <WH1544> she defiled <WH2930> herself.

"And she did not forsake <WH5800> her harlotries <WH8457> from [the time in] Egypt; <WH4714> for in her youth <WH5271> men had lain <WH7901> with her, and they handled <WH9439> her virgin <WH1331> bosom <WH1717> and poured <WH8210> out their lust <WH8457> on her.
"Therefore, <WH3651> I gave <WH5414> her into the hand <WH3027> of her lovers, <WH157> into the hand <WH3027> of the Assyrians, <WH1121> <WH804> after <WH5921> whom <WH834> she lusted. <WH5689>

"They uncovered <WH1540> her nakedness; <WH6172> they took <WH3947> her sons <WH1121> and her daughters, <WH1323> but they slew <WH2026> her with the sword. <WH2719> Thus she became <WH1961> a byword <WH8034> among women, <WH802> and they executed <WH6213> judgments <WH8196> on her.

"Now her sister <WH269> Oholibah <WH172> saw <WH7200> [this,] yet she was more <WH4480> corrupt <WH7843> in her lust <WH5691> than <WH4480> she, and her harlotries <WH8457> were more <WH4480> than <WH4480> the harlotries <WH2183> of her sister. <WH269>

"She lusted <WH5689> after <WH413> the Assyrians, <WH1121> <WH804> governors <WH6346> and officials, <WH5461> the ones <WH7138> near, <WH7138> magnificently <WH4358> dressed, <WH3847> horsemen <WH6571> riding <WH7392> on horses, <WH5483> all <WH3605> of them desirable <WH2531> young <WH970> men. <WH970>
"And I saw <WH7200> that she had defiled <WH2930> herself; they both <WH8147> took the same <WH259> way. <WH1870>

"So she increased <WH3254> her harlotries. <WH8457> And she saw <WH7200> men <WH376> portrayed <WH2707> on the wall, <WH7023> images <WH6754> of the Chaldeans <WH3778> portrayed <WH2710> with vermilion, <WH8350>

girded <WH2289> with belts <WH232> on their loins, <WH4975> with flowing <WH5628> turbans <WH2871> on their heads, <WH7218> all <WH3605> of them looking <WH4758> like officers, <WH7991> like <WH1823> the Babylonians <WH1121> <WH894> [in] Chaldea, <WH3778> the land <WH776> of their birth. <WH4138>
"And when she saw <WH4758> <WH5869> them she lusted <WH5689> after <WH5921> them and sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> to them in Chaldea. <WH3778>

"And the Babylonians <WH1121> <WH894> came <WH935> to her to the bed <WH4904> of love, <WH1730> and they defiled <WH2930> her with their harlotry. <WH8457> And when she had been <WH2930> defiled <WH2930> by them, she became <WH3363> disgusted <WH3363> with them.

"And she uncovered <WH1540> her harlotries <WH8457> and uncovered <WH1540> her nakedness; <WH6172> then I became <WH3363> disgusted <WH3363> with her, as I had become <WH5361> disgusted <WH5361> with her sister. <WH269>

"Yet she multiplied <WH7235> her harlotries, <WH8457> remembering <WH2142> the days <WH3117> of her youth, <WH5271> when <WH834> she played <WH2181> the harlot <WH2181> in the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>

"And she lusted <WH5689> after <WH5921> their paramours, <WH6370> whose <WH834> flesh <WH1320> is [like] the flesh <WH1320> of donkeys <WH2543> and whose issue <WH2231> is [like] the issue <WH2231> of horses. <WH5483>

"Thus you longed <WH6485> for the lewdness <WH2154> of your youth, <WH5271> when the Egyptians <WH4714> handled <WH9439> your bosom <WH1717> because <WH4616> of the breasts <WH7699> of your youth. <WH5271>

"Therefore, <WH3651> O Oholibah, <WH172> thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God, <WH3068> 'Behold <WH2009> I will arouse <WH5782> your lovers <WH157> against <WH5921> you, from whom <WH834> you were alienated, <WH5361> and I will bring <WH935> them against <WH5921> you from every <WH5439> side: <WH5439>

the Babylonians <WH1121> <WH894> and all <WH3605> the Chaldeans, <WH3778> Pekod <WH6489> and Shoa <WH7772> and Koa, <WH6970> [and] all <WH3605> the Assyrians <WH1121> <WH804> with them; desirable <WH2531> young <WH970> men, <WH970> governors <WH6346> and officials <WH5461> all <WH3605> of them, officers <WH7991> and men <WH7121> of renown, <WH7121> all <WH3605> of them riding <WH7392> on horses. <WH5483>

'And they will come <WH935> against <WH5921> you with weapons, <WH2021> chariots, <WH7393> and wagons, <WH1534> and with a company <WH6951> of peoples. <WH5971> They will set <WH7760> themselves against <WH5921> you on every <WH5439> side <WH5439> with buckler <WH6793> and shield <WH4043> and helmet; <WH6959> and I shall commit <WH5414> the judgment <WH4941> to them, and they will judge <WH8199> you according to their customs. <WH4941>

'And I will set <WH5414> My jealousy <WH7068> against you, that they may deal <WH6213> with you in wrath. <WH2534> They will remove <WH5493> your nose <WH639> and your ears; <WH241> and your survivors <WH319> will fall <WH5307> by the sword. <WH2719> They will take <WH3947> your sons <WH1121> and your daughters; <WH1323> and your survivors <WH319> will be consumed <WH398> by the fire. <WH784>
'They will also strip <WH6584> you of your clothes <WH899> and take <WH3947> away your beautiful <WH8597> jewels. <WH3627>

'Thus I shall make your lewdness <WH2154> and your harlotry <WH2184> [brought] from the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> to cease <WH7673> from you, so that you will not lift <WH5375> up your eyes <WH5869> to them or remember <WH2142> Egypt <WH4714> anymore. <WH5750>'

"For thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God, <WH3068> 'Behold, <WH2009> I will give <WH5414> you into the hand <WH3027> of those whom <WH834> you hate, <WH8130> into the hand <WH3027> of those from whom <WH834> you were alienated. <WH5361>

'And they will deal <WH6213> with you in hatred, <WH8135> take <WH3947> all <WH3605> your property, <WH3018> and leave <WH5800> you naked <WH5903> and bare. <WH6181> And the nakedness <WH6172> of your harlotries <WH2183> shall be uncovered, <WH1540> both your lewdness <WH2154> and your harlotries. <WH8457>

'These <WH428> things <WH428> will be done <WH6213> to you because you have played <WH2181> the harlot <WH2181> with the nations, <WH1471> because <WH5921> <WH834> you have defiled <WH2930> yourself with their idols. <WH1544>
'You have walked <WH1980> in the way <WH1870> of your sister; <WH269> therefore I will give <WH5414> her cup <WH3563> into your hand. <WH3027>'

"Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God, <WH3068> 'You will drink <WH8354> your sister's cup, <WH3563> Which is deep <WH6013> and wide. <WH7342> You will be laughed <WH6712> at and held in derision; <WH3933> It contains <WH3557> much. <WH4767>
'You will be filled <WH4390> with drunkenness <WH7943> and sorrow, <WH3015> The cup <WH3563> of horror <WH8047> and desolation, <WH8077> The cup <WH3563> of your sister <WH269> Samaria. <WH8111>

'And you will drink <WH8354> it and drain <WH4680> it. Then you will gnaw <WH1633> its fragments <WH2789> And tear <WH5423> your breasts; <WH7699> for I have spoken, <WH1696>' declares <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God. <WH3068>

"Therefore, <WH3651> thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God, <WH3068> 'Because <WH3282> you have forgotten <WH7911> Me and cast <WH7993> Me behind <WH310> your back, <WH1458> bear <WH5375> now <WH1571> the [punishment] of your lewdness <WH2154> and your harlotries. <WH8457>'"
Moreover, the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, "Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> will you judge <WH8199> Oholah <WH170> and Oholibah <WH172>? Then declare <WH5046> to them their abominations. <WH8441>

"For they have committed <WH5003> adultery, <WH5003> and blood <WH1818> is on their hands. <WH3027> Thus they have committed <WH5003> adultery <WH5003> with their idols <WH1544> and even <WH1571> caused their sons, <WH1121> whom <WH834> they bore <WH3205> to Me, to pass <WH5674> through <WH5674> [the fire] to them as food. <WH402>
"Again, <WH5750> they have done <WH6213> this <WH2088> to Me: they have defiled <WH2930> My sanctuary <WH4720> on the same <WH1931> day <WH3117> and have profaned <WH2490> My sabbaths. <WH7676>

"For when they had slaughtered <WH7819> their children <WH1121> for their idols, <WH1544> they entered <WH935> My sanctuary <WH4720> on the same <WH1931> day <WH3117> to profane <WH2490> it; and lo, <WH2009> thus <WH3541> they did <WH6213> within <WH8432> My house. <WH1004>

"Furthermore, <WH637> they have even <WH3588> sent <WH7971> for men <WH376> who come <WH935> from afar, <WH4801> to whom <WH834> a messenger <WH4397> was sent; <WH7971> and lo, <WH2009> they came <WH935> – for whom <WH834> you bathed, <WH7364> painted <WH3583> your eyes, <WH5869> and decorated <WH5710> yourselves <WH5710> with ornaments; <WH5716>
and you sat <WH3427> on a splendid <WH3519> couch <WH4296> with a table <WH7979> arranged <WH6186> before <WH6440> it, on which you had set <WH7760> My incense <WH7004> and My oil. <WH8081>

"And the sound <WH6963> of a carefree <WH7961> multitude <WH1995> was with her; and drunkards <WH5433> were brought <WH935> from the wilderness <WH4057> with men <WH376> of the common <WH7230> <WH120> sort. <WH7230> <WH120> And they put <WH5414> bracelets <WH6781> on the hands <WH3027> of the women and beautiful <WH8597> crowns <WH5850> on their heads. <WH7218>
"Then I said <WH559> concerning her who was worn <WH1087> out by adulteries, <WH5004> 'Will they now <WH6258> commit <WH2181> adultery <WH2181> with her when she is [thus]?'
"But they went <WH935> in to her as they would go <WH935> in to a harlot. <WH2181> Thus <WH3651> they went <WH935> in to Oholah <WH170> and to Oholibah, <WH172> the lewd <WH2154> women. <WH802>

"But they, righteous <WH6662> men, <WH376> will judge <WH8199> them with the judgment <WH4941> of adulteresses, <WH5003> and with the judgment <WH4941> of women who shed <WH8210> blood, <WH1818> because <WH3588> they are adulteresses <WH5003> and blood <WH1818> is on their hands. <WH3027>
"For thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God, <WH3068> 'Bring <WH5927> up a company <WH6951> against <WH5921> them, and give <WH5414> them over to terror <WH2113> and plunder. <WH957>

'And the company <WH6951> will stone <WH7275> them with stones <WH68> and cut <WH1254> them down <WH1254> with their swords; <WH2719> they will slay <WH2026> their sons <WH1121> and their daughters <WH1323> and burn <WH8313> their houses <WH1004> with fire. <WH784>
'Thus I shall make lewdness <WH2154> cease <WH7673> from the land, <WH776> that all <WH3605> women <WH802> may be admonished <WH3256> and not commit <WH6213> lewdness <WH2154> as you have done.

'And your lewdness <WH2154> will be requited <WH5414> upon you, and you will bear <WH5375> the penalty <WH2399> of [worshiping] your idols; <WH1544> thus you will know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH136> God. <WH3068>' "
